error.title: Error!
error.400_e: Invalid input detected. Please check your input.
error.429_e: The server is receiving too many requests. Please try again later.
error.500_e: The server stopped working due to an unexpected error.

login.title: Login
login.login_kkutu: Please login to play DE LZB KKuTu.

loginfail.title: Login Failed
loginfail.description: Failed to login. Please try again.

kkutu.title: Rule the words! KKuTu Online
kkutu.meta_desc: Online Word Chain, Shiritori, Initial Quiz, Crossword, Typing Battle! Be the master of vocabulary in KKuTu.
kkutu.websocketUnsupport:
This game supports Internet Explorer (10+), Chrome (16+), Firefox (11+), Opera (12.1+), Safari (6+)!
Please update your browser.
kkutu.dictionarySupport: Dictionary Data Provided by: Standard Korean Language Dictionary, WordNet
kkutu.welcomeTestServer: You have connected to the Test Server. This server may explode or close without special notice.
kkutu.error_full: The server has exceeded its maximum capacity... Please try again later!!!
kkutu.error_401:
Guest accounts can only spectate games.
Please click the login button at the top right to log in!
kkutu.error_402:
Guest accounts can only connect to the Potato server.
Please click the login button at the top right to log in!
kkutu.error_404: No available room found. Would you like to create a new room?
kkutu.error_405: The specified user could not be found.
kkutu.error_406: You cannot re-enter a room from which you were forcibly removed.
kkutu.error_408: This connection has been terminated because the account logged in from another location.
kkutu.error_409: This account is already logged in.
kkutu.error_410: You have been removed from the game by an administrator.
kkutu.error_411:
You cannot start the game alone.
If you wish to play solo, please click [Practice] or use the [Invite] → [Invite AI] feature.
kkutu.error_412: All players must be in a ready state.
kkutu.error_413: At least one topic must be selected.
kkutu.error_414: An inappropriate topic has been detected. Please select the topic again.
kkutu.error_415: Kkutu bots cannot participate in this game mode.
kkutu.error_416:
This room is already in a game.
Would you like to enter the room to spectate?
kkutu.error_417: This account does not exist in the lobby.
kkutu.error_419: This user has already received an invitation request.
kkutu.error_421:
Profile management is available after logging in.
Please click the login button at the top right to log in!
kkutu.error_423:
The shop is available after logging in.
Please click the login button at the top right to log in!
kkutu.error_424:
The specified user is not connected to Kkutu or is not connected to this server. (If the name contains spaces, please remove them.)

User:
kkutu.error_425: There is no one to reply to.
kkutu.error_427: The item's usage period has expired.
kkutu.error_428: Observers will automatically leave the room when the game ends.
kkutu.error_432: The room configuration is invalid. Please reset the number of players.
kkutu.error_433: The room configuration is invalid. Please reset the number of rounds.
kkutu.error_434: This can no longer be used.
kkutu.error_435: You can combine up to a maximum of 6 letter fragments at once.
kkutu.error_436: You can only combine words registered in the dictionary.
kkutu.error_437: You have been removed from the room for skipping turns for 3 consecutive rounds.
kkutu.error_438: This feature is not available during the game.
kkutu.error_440: Guests, unverified users, and minors under the age of 16 are restricted from playing between 12:00 AM and 6:00 AM.
kkutu.error_441: Unable to read your date of birth information. Please check whether your date of birth is set to public on your logged-in account, then log in to Kkutu again. You may hide it after verification is completed.
kkutu.error_442: The connection to the server has been terminated due to no response for over 5 minutes.
kkutu.error_443: Chat usage for this account has been restricted by an administrator.
kkutu.error_444:
Game usage for this account has been restricted by an administrator.
Reason for restriction:
kkutu.error_445: Identity verification successful. Thank you for using Kkutu.
kkutu.error_446:
Game usage for this IP address has been restricted by an administrator.
Reason for restriction:
kkutu.error_450: The specified user is not connected to Kkutu or is not connected to this server.
kkutu.error_451:
Community features are available after logging in.
Please click the login button at the top right to log in!
kkutu.error_452: You can no longer add friends.
kkutu.error_453: Guest accounts cannot be added as friends.
kkutu.error_454: Waiting for a response to the friend request.
kkutu.error_455: Only friends who are offline can be removed.
kkutu.error_456: This nickname is already in use.
kkutu.error_457: You have recently changed your nickname. You can change it again after the period set by the server owner.
kkutu.error_500: Server maintenance or update in progress.
kkutu.turnError_402: No Killer Word on First Turn
kkutu.checkAgeAsk:
KKuTu requires birthdate for verification. It is used only for verification and internal processing and is not disclosed to third parties.
Proceed with verification?
kkutu.checkAgeInput1: Please enter the year of birth. (4 digits)
kkutu.checkAgeInput2: Please enter the month of birth. (1-12)
kkutu.checkAgeInput3: Please enter the day of birth. (1-31)
kkutu.checkAgeSure: Is the birthdate below correct? It is used only for verification and internal processing and is not disclosed to third parties.
kkutu.checkAgeCancel: Cancel verification and do it later?
kkutu.sureHandover: Are you sure you want to pass the host?
kkutu.linkWarning: You clicked a link. We are not responsible for any damages caused by visiting the link. Continue?
kkutu.trollWarning: You missed two consecutive turns. If you miss the third, you will be kicked from the room.
kkutu.modex0:
Chain English words starting with the last 2-3 letters.
apple → please → secret
kkutu.modex1:
Chain English words starting with the last letter.
apple → elephant → time
kkutu.modex2:
Chain 3-letter Korean words starting with the last letter.
강아지 → 지렁이 → 이발소
kkutu.modex3:
Chain Korean words starting with the last letter.
그물 → 물레방아 → 아저씨
kkutu.modex4: Guess the word using the given topic and initials.
kkutu.modex5: Guess the Korean words to fit into the crossword grid.
kkutu.modex6: Type the given Korean words as fast as possible.
kkutu.modex7: Type the given English words as fast as possible.
kkutu.modex8:
Chain Korean words ending with the first letter.
고구마 → 이실직고 → 맏이
kkutu.modex9: Name a Korean word matching the given initials.
kkutu.modex10: Name a Korean word matching the given topic.
kkutu.modex11: Name an English word matching the given topic.
kkutu.modex12: Find Korean words hidden in the scrambled letters.
kkutu.modex13: Find English words hidden in the scrambled letters.
kkutu.subJamsu: All players are ready. If the game doesn't start within 10 seconds, you will automatically leave the room.
kkutu.masterJamsu: You were kicked because the game didn't start even though all players were ready.
kkutu.hasKicked: You have been kicked from the room.
kkutu.inputChat: Type in the chat box below.
kkutu.explManner: Prevents the use of killer words.
kkutu.explMission: Get bonus points for using words containing specific letters.
kkutu.explStrict: Only standard nouns allowed (No dialects, old words, etc).
kkutu.explInjPick: Select topics to use in the game.
kkutu.kickVoteNotice: No response within time limit counts as Yes.
kkutu.guestExit:
Did you enjoy spectating?
Log in now to play!
kkutu.confirmNickChangeLimit: Are you sure you want to change your nickname/bio? You cannot change your nickname again for {V1} days.
kkutu.confirmNickChange: Are you sure you want to change your nickname/bio?
kkutu.confirmNickPolicy:
This nickname contains characters that violate our policy.
Would you like to remove them and proceed?
kkutu.cfTray: Click pieces to make a word.
kkutu.cfBlend: You can fuse 3 meaningless pieces. Click Compose to fuse.
kkutu.cmd_r: (/r) Press Ready. If Host, press Start.
kkutu.cmd_shut: (/shut target) Block all chat from target. Toggle.
kkutu.friendEditMemo: Set memo for this friend. (Max 50 chars)
kkutu.friendAddNotice:
Enter the ID number of the user to add.
Use /id command to find ID numbers.
kkutu.friendSureRemove: Delete this friend? You will also be removed from their list.
kkutu.dying: Connection will be terminated in 10s due to channel issues. Sorry for the inconvenience.
kkutu.blocked: Feature temporarily unavailable due to excessive messaging.
kkutu.paybackHelp: Hold Ctrl and click items to sell.
kkutu.surePayback:
Sell this item? Sold items cannot be recovered.
Expected Ping refund:
kkutu.alreadyGot: You already own this item.
kkutu.purchased: Purchase successful. Check [My Info] > [Edit Profile] to equip.
kkutu.okgExpl:
For every 10 minutes of gameplay with others,
you get a that increases XP and Ping gain!
kkutu.okgNotice: You played for 10 minutes and received a Buff!
kkutu.wpDesc2: You get XP reward if added!

game/fates.title: Card Match
game/fates.fcRule1: Press W to match target card and color in time! One chance only!
